website_summaries.verdict: A BPA-free zip-closing bag that can stand up on its own and be easily labeled for tracking your dates.
pros: Stays sealed nicely in the freezer
Stands up on their own, making it easier to transfer milk from the bottle into the storage bag
cons: Does not lay completely flat and can take up more space in your freezer than other bags

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bags that I’ve used. I like them better than lanisoh, medela, and nanobebe storage bags. They are nicely thick, stand up in the fridge, don’t leak, and the top doesn’t get in the way when you pour milk out (something that drives me crazy with other bags). Only change that I would make is changing the zipper to a double zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am a man and I do not breastfeed. I bought these self standing feezer safe, leak proof bags to freeze some liquids. It works well. The plastic is quite firm and make you feel that you can rely on it. It is indeed leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Savin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. The only issue is pouring the milk & them not standing up that easy. I bought many of these & yes, they dont stack easily like lenonsinoh bags but they don't leak like it either. I prefer these over Madela, Lenonsinoh, parent's choice & a few other's I have tried. I have 2 deep freezers of bm & these are the ones I know don't leak. Who cares if it's not easy to pour into, at least once they are in it stays that way. Also easy to pour ourlt since the bags aren't flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sucre

customer_reviews.title: A solid milk bag
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive bags. I love how they hold 7 ounces bc I'm an overproducer. Easy to open and pour into. Haven't had any leaks. Doesn't freeze flat when it has 7oz (which is the max amount) but it's not absurd either. They're pretty durable. That being said, they're nothing special. Wish they had a spout without a price increase. They get the job done but I now need 100ct and I'm currently picking the most cost effective option with decent reviews (which is dr browns).
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd favorite milk storage bags I've already reordered twice. I bought them because my usual was out of stock and I was not disappointed. At first the material seemed kind of thin and flimsy but I have not had any rip! The seal didnt seem that sturdy, but I haven't had any leak and I use several daily. I like that there isn't all the extra bag above the seal so it's easy to pour milk in and out without making a mess. I freeze 2-3 ounces at a time and they freeze pretty flat I am able to stack them fine.
customer_reviews.author: PandaMom

customer_reviews.title: Dont like the stiffness of the bags.
customer_reviews.text: ***Edited to add...these bags leak!!! Dont waste your money and breastmilk. Have had multiple come up with holes. So disappointed. The bags are not very flexible so pouring in and trying to get all the air out doesnt work so well. Reason for over all rating.
customer_reviews.author: JTAz

customer_reviews.title: Not good for efficient flat freezer storage of more than 4oz
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these bags at all!! Yes they're thicker and sturdier bags than some but they do not lay flat when freezing 6oz of milk at a time due to the fact that they only fit 6oz before not being able to close the bags. They dont have the extra room at the top to let any air out to lay flat. If you're looking to freeze 6oz bags at a time and be able to store them efficiently these are not the bags for you. I will be using them for my fridge stash and buying others for my freezer stash.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Eighmy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: [UPDATED 8/11/19] Don’t waste your money. Initially I thought they were good until the last 20 bags. The zip would not close on all of them. Very frustrating. I recommend milk bags with double zip to prevent waste. I used these for 3 months and I will not repurchase. These are good for the price point however if you produce more then 6oz per pump you will have to use two bags. I haven’t had leak, tear, or spill problems so far. I just don’t like I have to use two bags making them last less. Next time I’ll buy mommy’s precious since you can fit 8oz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st batch was great, second batch not so good
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags and the first batch I bought worked great, accurate measuring, no leaks! I bought them again for myself and just opened the box while I was at work for my pumping session...the bags are not sealing well, resulting in leaks. I am so disappointed because I bought some for a friend who just had a baby. So not I am stuck with a bad batch of bags, because I tried multiple bags and they are all doing the same thing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Less leaks than any other brand
customer_reviews.text: I've used half of the bag and only one leak and it may have been my error. The measurement markings don't seem to be accurate, but I pour from a bottle and just mark it on the bag. The zipper is a little tougher to seal than some brands, but as long as you're conscientious of this, it is not a problem. Will definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Just terrible quality. I'm super bummed out, not worth it at all. Just spend the extra couple bucks and make sure your milk is actually stored safely for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: BOOO HISS on these
customer_reviews.text: These don't freeze flat, no matter what I do. They might be ideal for people for additional freezer space, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Economical Option
customer_reviews.text: I really like these storage bags because they are slightly cheaper than any other option I've seen and they work just as well as any other option I've tried. I've been using them for a couple months both in the freezer and the refrigerator and so far haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D

customer_reviews.title: Spilled milk makes all Mamas cry
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been buying different brands of bags to store my pumped breast milk. This is the third type I’ve tried. I don’t need anything fancy and as far as I can (or could tell) I thought it was a all bags created equal situation. I was wrong, these bags stink. I sealed one up, set it in the freezer and it flopped over and spilled everywhere. Liquid gold right down the drain, and a nice mess to clean up to. I don’t recommend this bag, won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Crying over spilled milk IS A THING
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should’ve stuck with the name brand bags, as they’re only a few bucks more. I used these after pumping at work only to find that the ziplock part at the top doesn’t seal. :( all my pumped milk from my 12hr shift wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Went back for more
customer_reviews.text: Rather than exploring more bags out there, I purchased these for a second time, because I like them so much. They are easy to pour into and out of and easy to open and close. I like that they are sealed and that there isn't a lot of extra plastic at the top.
customer_reviews.author: fbstuart

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, thick plastic, no leaks or breaks
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags for months and love them. I havent had not one leak or break on me so far. I have even reused some of them that I only refrigerated and it was still good thick plastic with no leaks. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Green

customer_reviews.title: THEY LEAK!
customer_reviews.text: The price is great for the quantity, but they LEAK! I sealed them shut and made sure they were sealed, but the milk goes straight through the ziplock. I’ll continue to use until they run out, but will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Leak
customer_reviews.text: No way I can zip the bag without my milk leaking to the top, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Krist Wongsuphasawat

customer_reviews.title: but I would not recommend it for freezer storage as it does not lay ...
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to the old Medela bags. Stands up, but I would not recommend it for freezer storage as it does not lay completely flat.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Just as good
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the name brand breast milk storage bags. Easy to use and label. Stores just as much milk. Why spend more if you don’t need too.
customer_reviews.author: C & B

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: They ar eliminate of flimsy, had a few bags break which was not ideal!
customer_reviews.author: matea

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit on pump
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awful. They're so tiny and made of this hard plastic. They don't fit on my pump. I'm going to pay the extra to get the medela bags next time 🙄🙄
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, inaccurate, hard to pour into bottles. Nothing to like.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Miles

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These bags do not open by themselves when thawing. I never had an issue with these bags like with other bags. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of iffy
customer_reviews.text: These are better for storing less than 3 ounces. The measurment line is only accurate when you stand it up and squeeze the sides which is kind of a hassle. These seem like thick plastic. Not sure I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: B Tatum

customer_reviews.title: feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a good deal, but they just feel cheap and I'm worried about my liquid gold seeping out of them in the freezer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great product
customer_reviews.text: I like how hardy these bags are and the zipper seal is great. The ounce measurements I feel like are off by almost a half ounce BUT I always pump the same everyday so this isn’t a concern to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brannons

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Great breast milk storage bags.. I’ve used other brand before and this one is thicker and much more steady..I would recommend it for sure...
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but not the worst
customer_reviews.text: Not bad only thing I don't like is you have to pull apart the bottom to get the bag to open up all the way pouring milk into won't make it open other then that they are not bad
customer_reviews.author: mtv girl

customer_reviews.title: Super leak proof, and self standing, the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these they never leak they are strong and thick, my favorite is they self stand!
customer_reviews.author: FunFamilyOf7

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff bags that’s wouldn’t hold 4oz of breastmilk once frozen. The bags ripped or cut easily from frozen breastmilk
customer_reviews.author: kiara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BAGS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact these bags compared to all others . Smallest bags but hold the most milk. very durable love the temp feature on corner of the bag . only thing I would change is the seal its not a double seal and makes no sound to ensure it is closed so I have to double and triple check before freezing bags. I will definitely be ordering more soon
customer_reviews.author: Shaquan Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Okay in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Thick, but not very flexible. This is a pretty solid unbendible plastic. Not ideal for folding over the top to freeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the amount and the quality of the product. As a mom of a newborn I can never have enough milk bags
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected bonus warm/hot indicator on bag
customer_reviews.text: The bags were perfect and stand up great so I'm not worried about spilling any breast milk...also I didn't realize that it has a indicator on the bag to show when it is warm or if it's too hot! That was a unexpected bonus that I didn't realize it had. I haven't used the warmer indicator yet but I will update if it is horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seriously are leak proof! LOVE them and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are actually leak proof, I trust their supper so much that I put them in my diaper bag and do not worry about them spilling everywhere. Highly recommend. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product with excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and the bags are perfect for storage. Very pleased with the purchase and will be back for more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not something I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: These work for what they are intended for just not well. I don’t like that you can’t feel them being closed so sometimes they aren’t and milk leaks out. They are a stiffer plastic than most other bags. Also the measurement markings are incorrect on them. I won’t be rebuying these once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: New one

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than I was hoping, therefore, they don't lay as flat as other brands when freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had never heard of this brand but I just needed a few bags and the price was right. Very happy, bag feels thick. They stand up well for pouring into.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea C.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s not recyclable which is why I am giving it a 4 stars, but it’s a great bag for breast milk storage
customer_reviews.author: Varinia Urday

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leak!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and thick but don’t freeze flat at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They are great! No leaks, and storage very well. I used them all up and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: These are great storage bags. The bottom opens wider so the milk stays put for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlee Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome !! Especially for how little they cost I thought they would suck in the freezer but we have been using them for 3 months now n love them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to freeze. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Donna George

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality, the bags are super thin. I am still using these but much prefer other brands over these. They feel like they are cheaply made. Still does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie Frantz

customer_reviews.title: No Leaks!  Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking these storage bags. Easy and quick to fill, they freeze flat-ish, and I haven't had any leaks.
customer_reviews.author: ALR

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: They work great and the deal is fantastic. The only issue I have is being able to get the air out of the bag. It’s because they are shorter bags. Other than that. They do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Crysanna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great quantity for very economical price.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a very good bag and the price is very affordable for a larger amount of bags. My only concern is that I've tried other brands of storage bags and I find the double lock helps to protect the milk better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great - I've never had any problems with them and have re-purchased.
customer_reviews.author: aspen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags overall but I do worry that they seem to read an ounce more ? You do need to make sure to press out all the air and ensure the zipper is locked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice secure, milk storage bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice secure, milk storage bags. Purchased as a gift. If I hear more from my friend I will edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: S Morey

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent storage bags. Sturdy and stands up easily in the fridge. Ziploc is reliable even after opening and closing multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: i love these bags they make pumping so much easier for storage
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These bags were very easy to use. It froze well and when it came time to it defrosted the milk quickly. I placed two orders.
customer_reviews.author: Artemisia

customer_reviews.title: Good but don’t lay flat
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags minus the fact that they won’t lay flat. That part Siri is for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Donatien

customer_reviews.title: Okay-ish milk bags
customer_reviews.text: So far a couple bags have leaked... not the best bags but will work for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and came in good condition and given date.Thanks Amazon and product company
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage of milk that you want to keep standing in the fridge. The plastic is durable and the seal is strong.
customer_reviews.author: selinaaniles

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a pain to tear the top bc you can only tear one at a time. Bag quality is good but wish there was a clicking sound or something to know it’s fully sealed
customer_reviews.author: Brynna G.

customer_reviews.title: Never a leak!
customer_reviews.text: They don’t lay flat in the freezer but I’ve never had a leak!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than some bags. Wasn’t sure about the tear tab but it works well. Freeze flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: These have been the best bags for me. Never have a problem with leaking like some others I’ve used. And the bags are very sturdy standing. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t write on them
customer_reviews.text: Can’t write on them doesn’t seem like they have the double zip close feature other bags have. Using only because I’m in need of more bags.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: These bags are thick which is great but they only have one zip compared to many other brands. If that zip isn’t perfect they will leak. Breast milk is gold.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy for milk storage
customer_reviews.text: Feel theres better bags to use ended up using to freeze homemade baby food instead of milk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable but Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: These bags are durable but the ounce markers are way off. They mark 4oz as 7oz.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price point but measurements weren’t accurate. Plastic is thicker than other bags i’ve used, stand up well.
customer_reviews.author: Shanae Em

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Thick and good quality. I put 7oz sometime while other brands offer only 5 oz Max in thr same size.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Bad seal
customer_reviews.text: Bags do not seal well at all, so i had milk that spilled if it was knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these 30 breast milk storage bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these 30 breast milk storage bags! First off they are bpa free without any chemicals and doesn't have any odor to them or make the milk spoiled! I highly recommend this one and the measurements are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba loves to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Quality and quantity
customer_reviews.text: I think this product worked great. I'm working on building my supplies so I was happy with the amount of bags I received for the price. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fields

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! No leaks, they stand nice and open/pour easy as well. Ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: brittany thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bags! Ive used many different ones and these ive ordered TWICE!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bags stand. Makes pouring the milk so much easier. :)

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cheap, measurements are accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags they are cheap and the measurements on the bag are accurate.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These were great I love them. They didn’t leak out or anything and they were thick.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Guaydacan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and reliable storage bags for breastmilk
customer_reviews.text: This has been very durable and reliable in all of my breastmilk storage. Highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Bags leak
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice the bags can hold 7oz but the seal on them are terrible. Can’t tell you how many bags have leaked :(

customer_reviews.title: WORST BAGS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE! THEY LEAK, THEY ARE IMPOSSIBLE TO CLOSE CORRECTLY. WASTE OF MONEY & HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: EMILY ROYAL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags. Stay up and when pitnin freezer they can be flat too. No tears so far. Will definitely buy again

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: They work okay but sometimes can leak through the zipper.

customer_reviews.text: This product has poor quality. Measurements are off, bags are tiny & have a poor seal.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Mae Batten

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice! My freezer is full of them 😂 they stay perfectly sealed, even on their side

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a great quality bag! They’re very thick, zip easily and don’t drip!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay, however I noticed that this brand leaks more than the other brands I tried.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Supper easy to use and definitely do exactly what it’s designed for
customer_reviews.author: Brianna F.

customer_reviews.title: Will work fine in crunch but better ones out there.

product_meta.title: Unimom 60 Breast Milk Storage Bags - Self Standing, Freezer Safe, Leak Proof Zip Top Closure, Pre Sterilized, BPA Free, Marked Measurements – 7oz – by Unimom
product_meta.description:
Size:60 CountThese Breast Milk Storage Bags from Unimom make transporting, storing and freezing milk easy and convenient. The bags are designed to take up less space and can be stored upright or laid flat. Pre-sterilized and self-standing bags hold up to 210 milliliters, allowing you to preserve the milk for as long as possible. 

 FEATURES:

 30 or 60 Bags
BPA Free
Pre-sterilized
Double Zip Top Seal
Double Layered
Self Standing
Freezer Safe
Dishwasher Safe
Leak Proof
Store up to 7oz/210ml
Reusable

QUALITY DESIGN

Unimom Breast Milk Storage Bags are designed to make storing milk effortless. A durable plastic and zip top closure ensure that milk won’t leak. While a compact design makes it easy to store and transport. Measurement markers make them easy to fill and transfer from bag to bottle with less mess. Store and preserve your nutrient rich milk for as long as you can and promote your little one’s health.

EASILY TRANSPORT

Our breast milk storage bags make transporting milk a breeze. Whether you’re working or traveling you can take and store fresh milk with you wherever you go.

PRE-STERILIZED AND HYGIENIC

Our pre-sterilized bags feature a hygienic seal that ensures that the bag hasn’t been exposed to harmful germs or bacteria.

EASY TO STORE AND FREEZE

Our bags are designed to make storing nutrient rich milk effective. Easily label your bags with your name, the date and time before storing using the marked header section. Self-standing bags are designed to take up less space leaving more room in your refrigerator or freezer. Preserve your breast milk and have it readily available for your baby. To defrost milk put the freezer bag in a bowl of warm water and wait till milk has reached the perfect temperature and is ready to serve.
feature_bullets: FREEZER SAFE AND SELF-STANDING: Easily store and freeze breast milk with self-standing bags. Our bags are freezer safe and stand up on their own.
DURABLE MATERIAL AND LEAK PROOF: Don’t worry about breast milk leaking or spilling. A durable pre-sterilized plastic makes bags leak proof.
ZIP TOP CLOSURE: A convenient zip top closure allows you to easily open and close bags. Resalable bags securely hold 210 milliliters (7oz) of breast milk.
BPA FREE: Protect your newborn from harmful chemicals like phthalate, bisphenol A (BPA) and lead. All Unimom products are BPA free and 100% safe.
COMPACT & CONVENIENT: These freestanding bags can be stored standing vertically upright or you can lay them down flat horizontally for space saving storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars420 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
